languages.text: {n}Кибелла хмурится, словно не понимая вопроса.{/n} "Тень неотделима от своего хозяина, Домин'{name}. Я буду следовать за тобой, как и прежде храня твою нить".
{n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла хмурится, словно не понимая вопроса.{/n} "Тень неотделима от своего хозяина, Домин'{name}. Я буду следовать за тобой, как и прежде храня твою нить".

traits.locale_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Enim'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

languages.text: {n}Frunce el ceño, como si no entendiera la pregunta.{/n} «Una sombra es inseparable de su señor{mf||a}, Domin'{name}. L{mf|e|a} seguiré como hasta ahora y protegeré su hilo».
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frunce el ceño, como si no entendiera la pregunta.{/n} «Una sombra es inseparable de su señor{mf||a}, Domin'{name}. L{mf|e|a} seguiré como hasta ahora y protegeré su hilo».

languages.text: {n}彼女は質問が理解できなったかのように、顔をしかめる。{/n}「影はその主から切り離せないものよ、ドミン・{name}。依然と同じくあなたに従い、あなたの糸を守るわ」
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は質問が理解できなったかのように、顔をしかめる。{/n}「影はその主から切り離せないものよ、エニム・{name}。依然と同じくあなたに従い、あなたの糸を守るわ」

languages.text: {n}她皱着眉头，似乎没听懂这个问题。{/n}“影子与主人是不可分离的，秘者{name}。我会像以前那样跟在你身边，守护你的丝线。”
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

traits.locale_text: {n}她皱着眉头，似乎没听懂这个问题。{/n}“影子与主人是不可分离的，秘者{name}。我会像以前那样跟在你身边，守护你的丝线。”

languages.text: {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn, als würde sie die Frage nicht verstehen.{/n} "Ein Schatten ist untrennbar mit seinem Meister verbunden, Domin'{name}. Ich werde Euch weiterhin folgen und Euren Faden bewachen."
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn, als würde sie die Frage nicht verstehen.{/n} "Ein Schatten ist untrennbar mit seinem Meister verbunden, Domin'{name}. Ich werde Euch weiterhin folgen und Euren Faden bewachen."

languages.text: {n}Elle se renfrogne comme si le sens de votre question lui échappait.{/n} « Une ombre est par définition inséparable de son maître, Domin'{name}. Je continuerai à vous suivre et à veiller sur votre fil. »
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle se renfrogne comme si le sens de votre question lui échappait.{/n} « Une ombre est par définition inséparable de son maître, Domin'{name}. Je continuerai à vous suivre et à veiller sur votre fil. »

languages.text: {n}Soruyu anlayamamışçasına kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Gölge dediğin efendisinden ayrılamaz Domin'{name}. Eskisi gibi seni takip etmeye ve ipliğini korumaya devam edeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}She frowns as if failing to understand the question.{/n} "A shadow is inseparable from its master, Domin'{name}. I will follow you as before and guard your thread."
